response.overview: DYNAMIC GLOVE on U-NEXT Vol.32 took place on May 3, 2025, at Korakuen Hall in Tokyo, Japan, promoted by DANGAN. This boxing showcase features Jukiya Iimura defending his OPBF Flyweight title against Esnes Domingo in a 12-round main event rematch, with Iimura seeking to solidify his reign and Domingo aiming for redemption. The co-main event pits Yudai Murakami against Shuma Nakazato for the Japanese Lightweight title in a 10-round clash. Other bouts include Kenji Fujita vs. Michael Butt in a featherweight contest and Seiya Miyaguchi vs. Yoshi Sugiura in a minimumweight fight.
response.tagline: OPBF Flyweight & Japan Lightweight Title Match
response.title: DYNAMIC GLOVE on U-NEXT vol.32
